page.title: 14Cottesmore Church Parade
page.content: We have Church Parade beacause it is part of our Brownie Promise.The part we mean is to do our duty to God.We meet outside the camp gates at 9:45a.m. near where the church is.When we have all the Brownies from our pack we walk up to church.We have four flags,3rd Cottesmore,2nd Cottesmore, 3rd Cottesmore Guides and the Union Jack.When we get to the church we wait for a bit, then when the first hymn is sung, we walk up the aisle with our flag and 2 escorts behind us.We have a gospel before we are blessed then while all the other people are being blessed the choir sings a song.Before the choir walks out the Brownies collect their flags and walk down the aisle.When the service is over the choir walks out.
